jobContext:
Lead and develop an effective team of Wet QA, Dry QA, and technical staff who are responsible for all quality-related assignments/issues.

Supervise subcontract related garments production and quality. 
Ensures that safety, quality and maintain compliance issues are taken as part of the job. 
Monitor and support the quality issues and communicate with audit and pre-inspection team.
jobDescription: Lead and develop an effective team of Wet QA, Dry QA, and technical staff who are responsible for all quality-related assignments/issues.

jobContext:
Ensure desired sewing quality standard of buyers to shipment the products on time.
Review Pilot Run sample before washing and compare quality with approved sample.
Confirm successful validation of size set and pilot runs to clarify possible measurement issues or other washing issues.
Deal with the critical sewing operation, quality points, and explain to the Quality team.
Real time decision making to continue the smooth process operation and taking initiatives or preventive action to avoid any Quality violation.
Monitoring daily worker/ Staff absenteeism and make balance through redistribute the existing manpower to ensure the proper functional executions. Besides, analysing the importance, eliminate the less necessary execution or procedure to utilize the Manpower resource in essential point.
Closely work with subordinates (QC/ QA/ Supervisor) are well trained and qualified enough to conduct audit/ inspection as per buyer's requirement. In case of inefficient employees and train up them to make more efficient on their duties, also to reduce the manpower migration and absenteeism arrange motivational meeting as well.
Arrange daily awareness & tasks review meeting with all subordinates (QC/ QA/ Supervisor) to make proper daily work plan and tracking the pending activities to be done as priority basis.
Preparing or summarizing weekly / monthly or any periodical quality inspection analysis reports to tracking the quality progression/ degradation.
Inline inspection findings should be discussed with the respective Production, IE & QA team to get the corrective actions.
To handle all kinds of technical and quality audits.
Any other task assign by the management.
jobDescription: Ensure desired sewing quality standard of buyers to shipment the products on time.
educationalReq: Masters degree in any discipline, Bachelor degree in any discipline

jobContext:
Collaborate closely with the Product Development Manager to execute the entire product development process, ensuring timelines and quality standards are met under the Manager's guidance.
Work hand in hand with the design teams to bring innovative and marketable product concepts to life, aligning with customer needs and brand strategy.
Conduct thorough market research to identify emerging trends and consumer preferences, translating these insights into innovative and competitive product offerings.
Engage collaboratively with cross-functional teams, including design, sourcing, merchandising, and marketing, to ensure a unified product vision and successful execution.
Oversee critical tasks such as product testing, sample review, and quality assurance, ensuring products align with internal standards and regulatory requirements.
Participate in competitive analysis and benchmarking activities to remain updated on industry trends and pinpoint opportunities for enhancement.
Establish and cultivate robust relationships with suppliers and vendors, guaranteeing adherence to quality standards and technical specifications.
Collaborate seamlessly with cross-functional teams to infuse sustainability principles into the product design and development process.
Contribute to impactful product presentations to key stakeholders.
Stay attuned to market trends, innovative advancements, and dynamic market dynamics that may influence product strategies.
Demonstrate ability to meet deadlines and adhere to timelines within budgetary constraints.
jobDescription: Collaborate closely with the Product Development Manager to execute the entire product development process, ensuring timelines and quality standards are met under the Manager's guidance.
educationalReq: Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Fashion Design Technology, Bachelor degree in any discipline
